channel.title: Comments on: Dindy One Month After Turning Free
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Will be done... right after SMS replies, which turns out to be quite a challenge to define properly
item.content:encoded: Will be done… right after SMS replies, which turns out to be quite a challenge to define properly

item.title: By: Albert
item.dc:creator: Albert
item.description: :) The donate from the app is a must!
item.content:encoded:
:)
The donate from the app is a must!

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:)
I think I might start counting how many calls were "blocked" and then tell the user "Dindy already allowed you to sleep quietly 100 times. It must be worth a buck." Also, I will have my face next to the link pleading like the latest Wikipedia campaign. I'm sure it'll work :)
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
:)

I think I might start counting how many calls were “blocked” and then tell the user “Dindy already allowed you to sleep quietly 100 times. It must be worth a buck.” Also, I will have my face next to the link pleading like the latest Wikipedia campaign. I’m sure it’ll work :)

Thanks

item.title: By: Udim
item.dc:creator: Udim
item.description: I don't think anybody has any reason to go to the site. I prefer a donation button inside the app. :)
item.content:encoded:
I don’t think anybody has any reason to go to the site.
I prefer a donation button inside the app. :)
